trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_SEQ_00<tab>Bhirdraeg's La Noscean oranges are ripe and ready for picking.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_SEQ_01<tab>Bhirdraeg has asked you to pick his ripe La Noscean oranges. The irascible pirates under him would rather pick fights than fruits, leaving the labor to you.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_SEQ_02<tab>You have picked an adequate number of oranges. Bring them back to Bhirdraeg.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_SEQ_03<tab>The pirates' antics have sown seeds of discontent among the local growers, and the Admiral appears to be entangled in the weeds.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_1<tab>Bah, I can't even rely on those rotten pirates to pick these ripe oranges.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_2<tab>Yet if I leave them a day longer, they're like to fall from the boughs.
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_3<tab>Mayhap you can grab a few for me. You're not afraid of a pesky hornet or two, are you?
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_11<tab>Look at those luscious oranges brimming with nectar! They could drop any second!
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_12<tab>Ah, ripe to perfection! How sweet it is!
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_13<tab>If that lackadaisical lot of retired pirates comes down with scurvy, it'd serve them right!
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_BHIRDRAEG_000_14<tab>It just goes to show you can't teach an old sea dog new tricks. You'd think the Admiral would know that!
TEXT_SUBSEA060_00472_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>A maddening buzzing fills your ears!
